name: Prateek Kumar
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Systems-oriented software engineer focused on frontend application architecture (React) and stable system boundaries (client ↔ API).
Builds workflow-driven products with an emphasis on performance, observability, and long-term maintainability.
Comfortable operating across layers (frontend, API design collaboration, Linux/Nginx, CI/CD) based on system risk.

highlights: Led development of responsive web applications using React.js and Redux with a focus on predictable state and maintainable UI boundaries.
Collaborated on API contracts and REST integration to reduce coupling and improve debuggability across frontend/backend teams.
Improved performance and cross-browser reliability through systematic profiling, UI render optimization, and regression-safe refactors.
Owned delivery execution: breakdown of work, reviews, and iterative releases; contributed to team workflow and reporting.
Built and maintained customer-facing and internal web modules using React.js/Redux, with mobile-first responsive layouts.
Developed and integrated REST APIs; worked across frontend and backend to deliver end-to-end features.
Handled deployment and maintenance on Apache hosted on AWS EC2; supported static/media delivery patterns using S3.
Wrote clean, testable code and maintained responsive behavior across devices and browsers.

certifications: Certificate for Completion of Python Training
